name: VoiceSparkBlog
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to the latest Voice Spark Live flash briefing.
After you enable, just say “play my flash briefing” to start listing. This flash briefing is updated regularly and will give you the latest blog posts from voicespark.live. VSL has a goal to help people get the most out of their voice enabled devices through education and discussion from industry leaders, developers and those who have adopted voice.
This Voice Spark Live flash briefing is great for education on voice enabled devices, voice assistants and over all voice technology.

For all of VSL content please visit www.voicespark.live
You can also contact us at us@voicespark.live
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
